statements: DELETE FROM vehicle_insurance WHERE policy_number = 101 AND expiration_date < '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM vehicle_insurance WHERE expiration_date < '2022-01-01' AND coverage_details LIKE '%comprehensive%';
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 5 AND expiration_date < '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM insurance_providers WHERE provider_name = 'ABC Insurance' AND provider_address LIKE '%California%';
DELETE FROM drivers WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE year < 2010 AND make = 'Toyota';
